faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some common questions about our social club.
faq.open: Open now every day from 10:00 a.m – 10:00 p.m
faq.first-description: Our club is open to adults (18+ or 21+, depending on local laws) who share an appreciation for fine tobacco products and social gatherings. We welcome both casual smokers and enthusiasts.
faq.second-title: Where and when do you meet?
faq.second-description: We host regular meetups at designated lounges and private venues. Events vary from weekly casual gatherings to special tasting sessions. Check our event calendar for upcoming dates.
faq.third-description: Absolutely! We welcome anyone interested in the culture and social aspects of smoking, even if they don’t partake themselves. Many of our events focus on history, craftsmanship, and community.
faq.forth-title: What kind of events do you organize?
faq.forth-description: Our club hosts cigar and pipe tastings, social meetups, expert talks, and themed nights. We also collaborate with brands and lounges to offer exclusive experiences for our members.
